mapper.sql: id, merid, ordernum, money, advertise_money, balance, paysource, paytype, status, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into hd_mer_detail (merid, ordernum, money, balance, paysource, paytype, status, create_time) values (#{merid}, #{ordernum}, #{money}, #{balance}, #{paysource}, #{paytype}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select
from hd_mer_detail where merid = #{merid} order by id desc

select md.*,cc.equipmentnum as devicenum from hd_mer_detail md LEFT JOIN hd_chargerecord_copy cc on cc.ordernum = md.ordernum where md.merid = #{merid} and md.paysource = 1 and md.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} order by id desc limit #{startnum},10

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 2 AND `status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wechatnum, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 2 AND `status` = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refwechatnum, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 3 AND `status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS alipaynum, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 3 AND `status` = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refalipaynum, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 4 AND `status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unionpaynum, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 4 AND `status` = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunionpaynum,
SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 2 AND `status` = 1 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS wechatmoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 3 AND `status` = 1 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS alipaymoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 2 AND `status` = 2 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS refwechatmoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 3 AND `status` = 2 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS refalipaymoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 4 AND `status` = 1 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS unionpaymoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paytype = 4 AND `status` = 2 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS refunionpaymoney,
SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 8 AND paytype = 1 AND `status` = 2 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS incomepaymentmoney, SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 8 AND paytype = 2 AND `status` = 2 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS wechatpaymentmoney FROM hd_mer_detail
AND merid = #{dealer} AND paysource = #{source} AND paytype = #{type} AND status = #{status} AND create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time <= #{endTime}
